<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get roles associated with ticket"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/roles"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the list of roles that have access to or are associated with the specified ticket. This includes roles assigned through team membership, location-based access, or direct permissions.

**Prerequisites**
1. **ticketId** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) to locate the ticket and extract `Items[].TicketId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search tickets: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) with filters → extract `Items[].TicketId`.
2. Call [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/roles](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-roles) to retrieve associated roles.
3. Use role information for permission checks or assignment workflows.

**Pagination**: Supports `$p` (page index) and `$s` (page size) query parameters. Default page size is 100.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ticketId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"UUID of the ticket","example":"a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890"},{"name":"$p","in":"query","schema":{"type":"integer","default":0},"description":"Zero-based page index."},{"name":"$s","in":"query","schema":{"type":"integer","default":100},"description":"Number of roles per page."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
